name: Horizon of Focus (GTD) | Notion Template
description: A Framework For Gaining Clarity And Direction in Work and Life.Your time is limited. Wouldn't it be nice to always know that you are spending it optimally, working on what matters most? Horizon of Focus (From Getting Things Done) is a Notion tool that will help you view your work from different altitudes.Each level represents a certain work and life perspective. You will be able to cover the whole range of the scale from high-level values to daily tasks.Wall of Love from our customers⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️A
features: People searching for a digital journal, agenda, or planners.; Goal-oriented people; People building a productivity toolbox to gain more free time.
